New Records: Brazil moved up to fourth place in the South American qualifiers after their win
Key Match Events: Rodrygo scored the only goal of the match with a deflected 30th-minute strike
Pre-Game Insights: Brazil struggled with fluency in recent international tournaments, including a quarter-final exit in the 2022 World Cup and a poor Copa America performance this year
Post-Match Reflections: The victory boosted Brazil's qualifying campaign, though they remain eight points behind leaders Argentina
